WRITING.TEXT: Thank you!
This one! http://static2.jetpens.com/images/a/000/000/1.jpg?s=7931ffaa367de6bd0395eaff03683629
Or did I?

Im not sure what to tell you, its line shading and eeh linework haha. I dont think my style has a name as I started doing this particular style a few years ago and has just become its own monster. But look at Ralph Steadman, I think I am in the same category as him.

Happy halloween :)
more stuff: http://www.instagram.com/thedeadpigeon

WRITING.TITLE: Harry the warlock dog, Ballpoint pen and copic markers, A4

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you, But I honestly cant say where my motivation for what I draw comes from. All I do is to sit down and start drawing something and keep drawing until it looks like something Im not ashamed of. The trick is just to draw and draw and draw, It does not matter what you draw as long as you draw. If you think to much about it you are just going to get afraid of the paper and walk away.

WRITING.TITLE: Bad Apple, Ballpoint pen and pencils, A4

WRITING.TEXT: 99% of the time I simply just make the misstakes work. I keep drawing until it looks good. But this and one other drawing I have done I had to retrace as I dont sketch anything out in advance. This one had a baby swan on its back from the beginning and it looked wrong so I had to redraw the whole thing. :)
Thank you, yea they are great artists :) I do have a website, its www.deadpigeon.se But where I upload all of my drawings frequently is on instagram: https://instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/

Nope not at all actually, There are 3 artists that I am influenced by and that is: Hokusai, Shohei Otomo and Ralph Steadman. But when I draw something Im not trying to mimic anything, I just sit down with my ballpoint pen and start drawing and whatever comes out comes out.
Haha, thank you :)
Average around 3 hours but this one took much longer for some reason.
Thanks man, it means a lot to hear that.
Hey again guys, here is the lastest one I made. https://instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/ deadpigeon.se

WRITING.TITLE: The Swan-Deer, Ballpoint pen and Copic markers, A4

WRITING.TEXT: It does not need to be important to people, it needs to be important for the person who makes it.
Haha no it was a Swedish supplier at the time that happened.
Thank you :)
Oh really, did we talk?
Somebody linked me a video of it and that was pure creepy haha :) But yes I see the similarities with the rabbits and my drawing.

Thanks man, Its very common to stagnate. This particular style that I use is something that was born from a frustrating call with my internet supplier. After the call I just pored my state of mind into the drawing and voila this style was born.
Haha okey, Ill keep that in mind. Thank you!
Yepp that is where I work :)

Hello, I thought I might post my links if anyone want to see more of this.
http://www.deadpigeon.se https://instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/

WRITING.TITLE: Winter hare, ballpoint pen copic markers, A4

WRITING.TEXT: I have one but its 3 years old and in bad quality. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T5m2HPItLBk
Thank you and yes I do :) https://instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
All kinds of people get tattoos these days ;) My most common customer is girls that want small cute stuff.

Ha! Yes I know that insects got exoskeletons but I just like to morph stuff. :) -I am working as a tattoo artist but I dont tattoo in the style I draw these illustrations, Or well from time to time people want something in this style but usually its just common subjects. Feel free to have a look at http://www.deadpigeon.se I try to separate my tattoo style from this personal drawing style as much as possible just to have this as something non work related. Yes the Japanese like my style and find it strange but I have not really tried to show it to the masses at all. Its just my customers that happen to see the framed prints I have on my wall who say that they enjoy it.
Sorry if my English was bad in this reply, Im just of to bed.
Good Night //Magnus
Thank you all for your positive feedback on the Mosquito Skeleton, here are some more of my illustrations.

I am very happy that so many of you enjoyed my Mosquito Skeleton, so I took some photos of other illustrations I have made for those who wants more. Thanks again for the positiv feedback!
https://instagram.com/thedeadpigeon/
https://www.deadpigeon.se
If you use instagram thats one way to get the notification. Threadless ships worldwide and handles everything for me.
Thanks, Yes in about 1 to 2 months there will be more recent work on there!

Hey, yea Im sorry but its 21 in our shop. I actually do sell shirts through threadless.com but they are not of the highest quality and the colors are a bit to saturated. As soon as I get full control over the shop Ill fix it. But feel free to take a look, the white once are the once that works the best. https://deadpigeon.threadless.com
Det dr med inspiration r lurigt, den kommer och den gr men bara man skiter i att vnta p inspiration och bara ritar, ritar och ritar s kommer den av sig sjlv. Tack sjlv.
Thank you for telling me its gorgeous, it means a lot.
Well, at the moment I just announce when something is for sale through my instagram but Im about to build something a bit more shopping smooth. Also just throwing me an email works :)
If I like the music it would be very possible :)
Haha
Haha thanks for taking your time to do that and thank you :)

I usually dont sell originals, I do however sell prints that look 99% like the original as I make them myself and can get all the colors just right. I dont do commissions for tattoo designs if Im not the tattoo artist who is going to make the tattoo (my designs are a little bit hard to get just right as a tattoo). But if you ever go to Tokyo Im here waiting for you :)
Haha sorry man :)

I used Copic markers but yea, they are really expensive and run out fast as hell. I actually use normal staedtler pencils and smooth them out with water most of the time. It can even look better then with Copic markers but it takes longer and is harder to master.

Thank you! On this I used copic markers and whatever was around me but I also use normal staedtler pencils and then smooth them out with water. The paper is awesome and I have used it for 4 years now. The only name I can find on it is b.n.t/home.
Well that might just happen ;) And thank you!
Yea I can see the similarities. I did however not look at anything as I drew this.
Nope I had not seen her stuff but I have now, pretty cool!
Haha well that was cool :)
Yes that will probably happen in a month or two when I get full control of the shop. At the moment that shop is in threadless beta mode so they do all the changes.
Nope, that was not me.
Thanks for checking it out! Ill do my best :)
Haha thanks! It makes me really happy to hear that!
I got more where that came from! Thank you.
Haha also they usually don't have human skulls and straws in their mouth :) Thank you!
Thanks! Yes I do sell limited prints from time to time. I use my instagram to announce if something is for sale.
Thanks! Sure, go bananas :)
